title: F*** the meta! We got this!

replies.body:
Normal players give a gank.
Here,
_**we are the gank**_

gold 5 

This is the elo we are in bronzies...
YOU WANT THIS?!?!?!?

At least Gold5 in season 3 was nicer than Silver =/

Besides, dumber stuff happens in Plat5

http://i.imgur.com/QaIW0li.jpg

You haven't lived until you've taken the next step.

http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20140528040535/leagueoflegends/images/0/08/Pentakill_Rises.jpg

The only team with the BEST Dragon, Baron, and Herald Control.

Not to mention the sustain in teamfights, in terms of mana, health, *and* lives. It's the team comp where death isn't the end of your participation!

That Yorick taught the enemy the true meaning of fear...
Oh I beat he did! XD And Mordekaiser can turn any fight into a 6 v 4 as well! XD
0/10, no last whispers
Please, do not F**c the meta. It will reproduce! Just ignore it!
Always use protection {{item:3102}}

I've won so many games with triple jung before. Usually it has to do with no bot lane but a top and mid, getting the mid fed, letting the top hold his own, and shutting down the bot lane. Its so funny and oddly works if we work together.
I feel sorry for yi, did you give him a lube? :D
Yi went devourer {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
you have to be blind bro. that is clearly warrior.

https://imgflip.com/readImage?iid=13765115
mb
It really sucks being the jungler on the other side of this kind of fight. I speak from experience {{item:3070}}
5 Junglers, 5 {{summoner:12}} . No one is safe

I just had a nasus vs gp lane where he was constantly all-in, neither of us got much farm but had a hell of a time killing each other. Forget ideal play patterns, two farm champions at each others throats is the silliest thing to live

This is my favorite reason for going top lane. I usually force all ins  unless im hard countered and KNOW im gonna get farmed. Just had a 54 minute game where i got first blood on a cocky zed mid then went top and started killing riven. Best part? Kog maw top lane! So fun, ended the game with like 8k extra gold because the team fights were so back and forth.

And Brand never got jungle item.

http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-HAXzlfTZQHM/U6UB2_BJXGI/AAAAAAAADa4/k6wiaSdHZOM/s1600/Toy+Story.+After+all+we've+been+through.+Betray.jpg
One time my entire team went mid. That victory was glorious.

Hahaha that's a good one. Recently I played a game that was really out of place. We had an adc and support both in the top and bot lanes. We had no jungler. I was Elise mid with {{summoner:6}} and {{summoner:4}} so I could roam really quick if needed. We won.

Honestly, when it comes to meta, I find the only thing that matters is a good balance of damage types and range (at least for most games against most people, ranked or not. I won't say how things go in high elo though.) You had damage/range balance to a T, no traditional support/adc duo required.

What gets iffy though are all-melee teams. I mean, sure, you might win. But sometimes, you reach this massive up-hill climb near midgame, where you CANNOT gain further objectives, even if you're ahead. No ranged against a team with ranged just... crushes your siege potential.

I bet there are solutions to that though:

{{champion:107}} : Hey Rammy, go stand under that tower for me.
{{champion:33}} : Okay.
{{champion:107}} : I know y- ... wow that was easy.

Did I mention his ult damages towers? Yeah... I need to try all melee with a Rammus quarterback.
My brother just won a game with 5 junglers. Just sayin'
